properties.entry: SELECT /* com.sabang.findMyRoom.notice.model.dao.NoticeDAO#selectNoticeList()*/ A.NOTICE_NO , A.VIEW_NO , A.USER_NO , A.TITLE , A.CONTENT , B.NICKNAME , A.CREATION_DATE , A.MODIFICATION_DATE FROM NOTICE A JOIN TBL_USER B ON (A.USER_NO = B.USER_NO) ORDER BY A.NOTICE_NO DESC
INSERT INTO NOTICE A ( A.NOTICE_NO , A.TITLE , A.CONTENT , A.USER_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_NOTICE_NO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? )
UPDATE /* com.sabang.findMyRoom.notice.model.dao.NoticeDAO#incrementNoticeCount(); */ NOTICE A SET A.VIEW_NO = (SELECT B.VIEW_NO FROM NOTICE B WHERE NOTICE_NO = ? ) + 1 WHERE A.NOTICE_NO = ?

SELECT /* com.greedy.sabang.notice.model.dao.NoticeDAO#selectNoticeDetail() */ A.NOTICE_NO , A.VIEW_NO , A.USER_NO , A.TITLE , A.CONTENT , B.NICKNAME , A.CREATION_DATE , A.MODIFICATION_DATE FROM NOTICE A JOIN TBL_USER B ON(A.USER_NO = B.USER_NO) WHERE A.NOTICE_NO = ?
